cast.name: 吉尔·艾肯伯里 Jill Eikenberry

introduction: With a $23 million donation from a private foundation, world-renowned Spanish architect Santiago Calatrava sets out to construct a one-of-a-kind sundial bridge, which draws considerable praise and contempt from critics and local residents alike. Narrated by actress Jill Eikenberry, this in-depth documentary explores Calatrava's creative process, the structure's unique features and the heated debate surrounding this work of art.
